title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 345.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 345.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

When used in this Part: (a) Division shall mean the Division of

Criminal Justice Services. (b) Commissioner shall mean the commissioner of the Division of Criminal Justice

Services. (c) Office shall mean the

Office of Probation and Correctional Alternatives located within the Division
of Criminal Justice Services. (d) Director shall mean the director of the Office of Probation and Correctional

Alternatives within the division. (e) Department shall mean a county probation
department or the City of New York probation department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
345.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
